text: Too many buses to cause jam but also helps me to get to the airport on my travels. Efficient arrivals
bus stop with one of the most buses in Singapore, need to remember that some buses go to the other end of the bus stop so need to chase it
Bus stop connecting north and east area
This bus stop is Soooooooooo good it never seems legit it seems good while traveling for the past few months this area I revisit at 5:15 for more information

Before the Bus Stop was constructed, passengers have to board bus services at heartland areas. After construction, this Bus stop serves many and journey time has been cut short due to express services.

Bus 89 is always full every weekdays morning.
The crowd starts at Seng Kang before the bus turns right into TPE. As route ply thru Schools, SAF Camps, Loyang Industrial and Changi Airfreight Centre, crowd is always expected. Sent multiple feedbacks to LTA regarding massive crowd on bus 89 but LTA is not doing anything to solve this crowd issue.

Edit: Bus 89 services improved, however Bus 118 waiting time can be as long as 17 minutes even during peak periods!
